Title: January 2018
Content: 16*p51947a01632* do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area13 this question is about carboxylic acids. (a) an organic compound, t, contains the elements carbon, hydrogen and oxygen only.  tcontains a carboxylic acid group and one other functional group.  *(i) a sample of compoundt of mass 2.25 g was burned completely, producing 3.30 g of carbon dioxide and 1.35 g of water.  in the mass spectrum of compoundt, the molecular ion peak is at m/e=90.   use all the data to calculate the molecular formula of compoundt.   you must show your working.(6)
